title: Pixel 3a XL unresponsive screen
content:
Hello.
Out of nowhere, my Pixel 3a XL stopped showing the screen. The phone is still responsive, I can feel the vibrations from messages etc.. I've had my phone in a really protective case.
I've tried rebooting it, hard resetting it like all the videos on youtube + I've also tried all steps on the Google support site.
I beg anyone please help me the repair of this phone is really expensive.
